response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which we believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. We understand its value to you stands at $1,500,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage over other potential buyers. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product or terms. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 1400000}
